H0.text: what is the common name for gravitational force. Mass Attraction

H1.text: what is the common name for gravitational force. Weight Force

H2.text: what is the common name for gravitational force. Cosmic Pull

H3.text: what is the common name for gravitational force. Gravity

A4.text: Gravity is the law that every object with mass attracts every other object in the universe in proportion to each mass and inversely proportional to the square of the distance between them.
